quotes.quote: We've been so concerned about being cool, relevant, and fun that we have forgotten to be bread, light, and life to a hungry, dark, and dying world.
If you focus on what you left behind, you will never see what lies ahead.
How sad it must be for you to be nothing more than a hollow statue, to have your tomb preserved and your story forgotten.
I want to believe that memories, even sad and painful ones, should not be forgotten forever.
A remembrance can mean nothing to the one remembered; it can only remind the ones left behind how little they did while you were still alive.
You will be left behind when you choose to remain behind.
If you are able to forget yourself, you will know you would not be forgotten!
Nothing brings to life again a forgotten memory like a fragrance.
The quality will remain when the price is forgotten.
If you're being ignored, that's a good time to concentrate on finding yourself and creating your own mystery.
Left behind as a memory for us.
Write what should not be forgotten.
Being unwanted, unloved, uncared for, forgotten by everybody, I think that is a much greater hunger, a much greater poverty than the person who has nothing to eat.
Only the forgotten are truly dead.
When the past is forgotten, the present is unforgettable
The little unremembered acts of kindness and love are the best parts of a person's life.
One always begins to forgive a place as soon as it's left behind.
The worst feeling is not being lonely, sometimes it is being forgotten by someone you can't forget.
It is better to take what does not belong to you than to let it lie around neglected.
If you would be unloved and forgotten, be reasonable.
People think they know you. They know the things about you that you have forgotten.
Family means no one gets left behind or forgotten.
Remember the unremembered; love the unloved; salute the unsaluted; hear the unheard; do the things which have not been done!
The things we remember best are those better forgotten.
The happiness of life is made up of minute fractions the little, soon forgotten charities of a kiss or a smile, a kind look or heartfelt compliment.
When a rose dies, a thorn is left behind.
Present opportunities are not to be neglected; they rarely visit us twice.
Experience is what you have after you've forgotten her name.
You can do terrible things when you don't know who you are.
What's the future of mankind? How do I know, I got left behind.
People have forgotten how to tell a story. Stories don't have a middle or an end any more. They usually have a beginning that never stops beginning.
Make someone feel something and you will never be forgotten.
There is nothing new except what has been forgotten.
